basics.label: Customer Service Rep
basics.summary: I'm currently seeking a full-time position, in an environment that will be a greater challenge for me. I'm aiming to learn new skills or use my current ones to better myself in the real world and allow opportunities for advancement. An accomplished and motivated individual with a solid background in AutoCAD design, layout, design for products and over 8 years of experience in a fast-paced, team-based, deadline-driven environment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported management in assuring floor agents completed tasks correctly, described product and pricings, answered product questions and complaints. Maintained cleanliness and presentation of stock room and production floor. Maintained a high-volume of inbound and outbound customer calls.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided excellent customer service, excellent time management skills, worked in high pressure situations. Followed food safety procedures and sanitation standards.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Checked patient data including insurance, demographic and health history. Maintained accurate records of patient care, condition, progress and concerns.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided professional, friendly and engaging service, assisted the chef in preparing food, maintained cleanliness of the kitchen and materials. Followed all safety and sanitation policies.
